resources.string: Name of the app (how it is displayed in the apps listing, etc.).\n\nThe original Estonian name translates as \"Ajapaik – then and now\" and some languages (Finnish, Swedish) have translated that instead of \"rephoto(graphy)\" in the name. Translators should consider which version fits best with their language.
Message when rephotograph has been captured and is being processed (cropped according to old image zoom etc)
Second part of message when rephotograph is processed.\n{{Identical|Please wait}}
{{Identical|Album}}\nMenu item for displaying the list of public albums (and albums created by the current user that are invisible for other users)
Alt message (not shown in user interface) for flip icon that flips image horizontally (needed when the historic image happens to be horizontally mirrored).\n{{Identical|Flip}}

Menu section opened by default that displays nearest geotagged images to user\'s location. NB! only geotagged images are displayed – when opening an album from albums menu all pictures inside the album are displayed that is also those not geotagged.
Menu item for querying images from Finnish central GLAMs repository. NB! These images are live queried and are not yet on Ajapaik platform.
Error message when no albums can be displayed (basically hypothetical).
Error message when user does not allow the app to access the device\'s location
Displayed when no images from nearby the user can be displayed
Second part of message when no nearby images can be displayed suggesting the user to select \'Albums\' from the menu to see images
Message displayed in user profile section indicating how many rephotos user has uploaded to Ajapaik (rephoto drafts do not count)
Message displayed in user profile section when user has not uploaded any rephotos to Ajapaik
When uploading of the rephoto fails
Confirmation message when the rephoto gets successfully uploaded to Ajapaik platform
Alert to log in in order to upload rephotos to Ajapaik
Confirmation in app settings section where user agrees to publishing rephotos under CC BY (has to be ticked otherwise user cannot upload rephotos).
\'Ajapaik rephoto\' should be the same as the name of the app ({{int:Ajapaik:strings-app name}}).
Needs to be ticked in app settings section when user wants the rephoto user interface tutorial to be displayed again when user opens rephotography view
Dialogue message when user wants to upload his or her first rephotograph. User can give the confirmation also later (or withdraw it) in settings menu
First screen in rephotography mode tutorial explaining the rephoto user interface
Second screen in rephotography mode tutorial explaining the rephoto user interface
Third screen in rephotography mode tutorial explaining the rephoto user interface
User needs to tap the \"Got it!\" messages in the rephotography tutorial to get rid of the 3 tutorial screens\n\n{{Identical|Got it}}
Dialogue message that pops up when the user opens the rephotography view for the second time
Note next to the \"Show tutorial again?\" dialogue explaining the user that tutorial can be also activated later on in the settings
Menu item for rephoto drafts, i.e. rephotos that have not been uploaded to Ajapaik yet (can be either deleted or uploaded)
Alert for unauthenticated user when accessing \"My rephotos\" menu
Alert for unauthenticated user when accessing \"My favorites\" menu
Start taking rephoto, or photo to replace the current one.
